name: pixshop
description: AI Photo Editor. Retouch, apply creative filters, change backgrounds, use color splash, and make professional adjustments to your images using simple text prompts.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html sw.js manifest.json dist/ && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --format=esm --jsx=automatic --external:react --external:react-dom/client --external:react-image-crop --external:exifreader
